section.title: &MiKTeXTools; Beta 13 (Jul 9, 2006)
section.para: The package repository infrastructure experienced some changes during the development of &MiKTeX; 2.5 (&Windows;). Therefore it was necessary to make available a new source release for &Unixlike; operating systems. There are no user visible changes.

section.title: &MiKTeXTools; Beta 4 (Jan 8, 2006)
section.para: Another source release for &Unixlike; operating systems.

listitem.para: &initexmf; (&MiKTeX; Configuration Utility) is used to maintain the &MiKTeX; file name database.
Experimental &mthelp; (&MiKTeX; Help Utility) can be used to browse package documentation files.
The package installation directory now defaults to the local &TEXMF; directory ($TEXMFLOCAL).
Fixed some Makefiles in order to support configure --srcdir=DIR.
Disabled the 30 sec. time-out for package downloads.
Fixed a SIGBUS error in the core library.

section.title: &MiKTeXTools; Beta 3 (Dec 16, 2005)
section.para: Another source release for &Unixlike; operating systems.

listitem.para: Fixed access permission bits for installed files.

section.title: &MiKTeXTools; Beta 2 (Nov 22, 2005)
section.para: Another source release for &Unixlike; operating systems.

listitem.para: The source package has been renamed to &MiKTeXTools;.

section.title: &MiKTeX; 2.5 Beta 1 (Aug 29, 2005)
